sms_masteryPanel.mustBeDockedHullmods: Must be docked at a market to build in hullmods.
sms_masteryPanel.mustBeDockedMasteries: Must be docked at a market to change active masteries
sms_masteryPanel.buildInOverMaxWarning: Warning: building in additional S-mods will incur a DP penalty
sms_masteryPanel.cantOpenPanel: Error initializing mastery panel -- close all interfaces and retry.

sms_descriptions.SModCreditsCost: Increases the credits cost of building in hullmods by %1$s.
sms_descriptions.SModCreditsCostNeg: Reduces the credits cost of building in hullmods by %1$s.
sms_descriptions.SModMPCost: Increases the mastery point cost of building in hullmods by %1$s, down to a minimum of %2$s.
sms_descriptions.SModMPCostNeg: Reduces the mastery point cost of building in hullmods by %1$s.
sms_descriptions.RestorationCost: Increases the cost of restoring damaged ships by %1$s.
sms_descriptions.RestorationCostNeg: Reduces the cost of restoring damaged ships by %1$s.
sms_descriptions.SModRemoval: Grants the ability to clear S-mods from ships.
sms_descriptions.SModRemovalPost: All S-mods must be removed. Costs nothing and refunds nothing.
sms_descriptions.SModsOverCapacitySingle: Grants the ability to bypass the standard S-mod limit, enabling installation of an additional %1$s S-mod
sms_descriptions.SModsOverCapacityPlural: Grants the ability to bypass the standard S-mod limit, enabling installation of an additional %1$s S-mods.
sms_descriptions.SModsOverCapacityPost: DP is increased by %1$s for each installed S-mod past the normal limit, rounded up.
sms_descriptions.ScaleOtherMasteries: Increases the effectiveness of all other mastery bonuses by %1$s.
sms_descriptions.ScaleOtherMasteriesNeg: Reduces the effectiveness of all other mastery bonuses by %1$s.
sms_descriptions.ScaleOtherMasteriesPost: Doesn't affect mastery bonuses that aren't scalable. May not affect some flat boosts as integer bonuses are rounded down.
sms_descriptions.FluxByShieldUpkeep: Increases flux dissipation by %1$s and flux capacity by %2$s of shield upkeep cost.
sms_descriptions.FluxByShieldUpkeepNeg: Reduces flux dissipation by %1$s and flux capacity by %2$s of shield upkeep cost.
sms_descriptions.FluxByShieldUpkeepPost: No effect if the ship has no shields.
sms_descriptions.RangeIfNoBonuses: Increases base ballistic and energy weapon ranges by %1$s if they aren't affected by any other bonuses.
sms_descriptions.RangeIfNoBonusesNeg: Reduces base ballistic and energy weapon ranges by %1$s if they aren't affected by any other bonuses.
sms_descriptions.RangeIfNoBonusesPost: Only counts base range bonuses. Conditional bonuses such as those occurring past a threshold do not negate this effect.
sms_descriptions.MaxOPForHull: Increases ordnance points by %1$s. Each %2$s of OP used past the base limit reduces hull integrity by %3$s.
sms_descriptions.MaxOPForHullPost: Hull reduction applied by this effect has a floor of %1$s and a cap of %2$s.
sms_descriptions.DPIfOnlyShip: If this is the only %1$s-class ship in your fleet, its DP cost is increased by %2$s.
sms_descriptions.DPIfOnlyShipNeg: If this is the only %1$s-class ship in your fleet, its DP cost is reduced by %2$s.
sms_descriptions.PeakCRMultipleShips: Increases peak combat readiness duration by %1$s for each additional %2$s-class ship in your fleet.
sms_descriptions.PeakCRMultipleShipsNeg: Decreases peak combat readiness duration by %1$s for each additional %2$s-class ship in your fleet.
sms_descriptions.PeakCRMultipleShipsPost: Effect stacks up to %1$s times and has a hard cap of %s increase to peak CR.
sms_descriptions.ShieldDeflection: Shield deflects all incoming projectiles for %1$s seconds when activated. Increases shield upkeep by %2$s and decreases shield unfolding rate by %3$s.
sms_descriptions.ShieldDeflectionPost: Shields take %1$s damage from deflected projectiles.
sms_descriptions.HighFrequencyMotes: Unlocks the %1$s, which upgrades the ship system's motes to deal additional energy damage that arcs through shields.
sms_descriptions.HighFrequencyMotesPost: Reduces the range to which motes can be launched by %1$s and reduces the maximum number of motes that can be simultaneously active by %2$s.
sms_descriptions.PhaseCloakResidue: The time flow bonus gained from phasing remains active after unphasing, decaying over the course of %1$s seconds.
sms_descriptions.PhaseCloakResiduePost: Damage taken is reduced by up to %1$s depending on local time flow. Cloak activation cost is multiplied by a factor of %2$s and cloak cooldown time is multiplied by a factor of %3$s. Negates the cooldown reduction of experimental phase coils.
sms_descriptions.EnergyMineConversion: Modifies the %1$s ship system, exchanging the standard high-explosive mines for lower yield mines with an energy and EMP payload.
sms_descriptions.EnergyMineConversionPost: Mine explosion damage is converted to energy type and reduced by %1$s. Upon exploding, mines spawn up to %2$s EMP arcs that deal %3$s energy damage and %4$s EMP damage each, with a chance to pierce shields depending on the target's hard flux level.
sms_descriptions.RecallDeviceRegeneration: Activating %1$s also instantly boosts fighter replacement rate by %2$s and has a %3$s chance of regenerating each destroyed fighter.

sms_misc.failedToGenerateMasteries: Failed to generate mastery effects! Check stack trace for details
sms_misc.doesntAffectModules: This effect doesn't apply to modules.
sms_misc.effectCantBeDeactivatedWarning: Warning: effect can't be deactivated once active
